WorkflowInfo.Name: Parallel Activity
WorkflowInfo.Description: Parallel activity with Conditional Wait, one branch is terminated
WorkflowInfo.Xoml: <SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:MemorySet;Assembly=MemorySet, Version=1.2.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:ConditionalWait;Assembly=ConditionalWait, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:Terminate;Assembly=Terminate, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"> <ns0:MemorySet IsValid="True" VariableScope="Workflow" VariableValue="0" DisplayName="Set Memory" IsAppend="False" VariableName="Branch1" x:Name="memorySet1" Description="Set variable to specified memory scope." TypeName="MemorySet" IsSaved="False" /> <ns0:MemorySet IsValid="True" VariableScope="Workflow" VariableValue="0" DisplayName="Set Memory" IsAppend="False" VariableName="Branch2" x:Name="memorySet2" Description="Set variable to specified memory scope." TypeName="MemorySet" IsSaved="False" /> <ParallelActivity x:Name="parallelActivity1"> <SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity1"> <ns0:MemorySet IsValid="True" VariableScope="Workflow" VariableValue="Done" DisplayName="Set Memory" IsAppend="False" VariableName="Branch2" x:Name="memorySet4" Description="Set variable to specified memory scope." TypeName="MemorySet" IsSaved="False" /> </SequenceActivity> <SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity2"> <ns0:MemorySet IsValid="True" VariableScope="Workflow" VariableValue="Done" DisplayName="Set Memory" IsAppend="False" VariableName="Branch1" x:Name="memorySet3" Description="Set variable to specified memory scope." TypeName="MemorySet" IsSaved="False" /> <ns2:Terminate DisplayName="Terminate" x:Name="terminate1" TerminationReason="Terminate Branch" IsValid="True" TypeName="Terminate" Description="Terminate the current branch in workflow" /> </SequenceActivity> </ParallelActivity> <ns1:ConditionalWait IsValid="True" x:Name="conditionalWait1" TimeInterval="" isDefault="0" DisplayName="Conditional Wait" TimeInSeconds="60" Description="Wait until the specified condition is true" MaxTimeout="True" TypeName="ConditionalWait" TimeValue="" Condition="%Branch1%='Done' AND %Branch2%='Done'" Timeout="00:01:00" /> </SequentialWorkflowActivity>
